grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 厄【ヤク】misfortune, bad luck, evil, disaster
厄年【ヤクドシ】unlucky year, critical year, certain years (esp. age 25 and 42 for men, 19 and 33 for women) that are considered unlucky (orig. in Onmyōdō)
災厄【サイヤク】calamity, disaster, accident
大厄【タイヤク】calamity, disaster, great misfortune, grand climacteric
